title: this sucks
body: I've logged back in and tried to start 2 games its now saying i abandoned  too many games (which i haven't at all) and had to wait 2 mins to start now i am on a 15 min wait before queue  wtf!!!!1

replies.body: There were some live service issues going on a few hours before you posted this that were resolved fairly quickly. If you're still experiencing issues, please let me know so we can work toward resolving this.
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
